input_text:
Job Title: Software Engineer

Location: Lutz, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot? Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

Flight Simulation Team Hiring C++ Software Engineer / Extremely Well-Known Aviation Company / Amazing Benefits + Work Culture + More!

This Jobot Job is hosted by Caitlyn Hardy

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $100,000 - $165,000 per year

A Bit About Us

Well-known, established, and stable aviation company, located in Lutz, Florida, in search of an experienced Software Engineer who is well-versed with flight simulation software. This is a direct-hire opportunity and you will work on cutting-edge prototypes for a brand new flight simulator project we are implementing. In this role, you will be responsible for the design, development, integration, test, and documentation for software in a flight simulator model.



Why join us?


Competitive starting salaries with growth potentialHealth benefits beginning day oneTuition assistance and continuing education programsPaid holidaysRelocation assistance (terms and conditions apply)Flight training courses and bonuses (terms and conditions apply)Potential for sign-on bonus

Job Details

Job Responsibilities

Design, develop, integrate, test, and document flight simulator software for flight dynamics modelsCreate, maintain, conduct flight test data collection plansDevelop Qualification Test Guide tests and documentation to validate flight dynamics modelsParticipate in customer acceptance and regulatory qualification of flight simulator training devicesPerform hardware/software integration & testing on flight simulator training devices

Qualifications

Experience developing and integrating flight dynamic modelsExperience creating Qualification Test GuidesBachelor's degree in EngineeringUnderstanding of longitudinal and lateral-directional flight dynamicsKnowledge of aircraft systems, specifically propulsion, flight controls, and ground reaction forcesExperience integrating/testing aircraft OEM aerodynamic models preferredFixed-wing flight dynamics and flight simulation industry experience preferredProficiency with C/C++, Python, Linux/Unix, and Shell scripting is a plusFlight testing experience is a plus

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot?

Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
